subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Islanders once again defied standard hockey operating procedure by signing goaltender Rick DiPietro to the longest contract in N.H.L. history — a guaranteed 15-year, $67.5 million deal.
snippet: The Islanders once again defied standard hockey operating procedure by signing goaltender Rick DiPietro to the longest contract in N.H.L. history — a guaranteed 15-year, $67.5 million deal.
